Module cz2002_assignment
Package databasescanner

Class databaseRW

java.lang.Object
databasescanner.databaseRW
public class databaseRW extends Object
This class implements methods to read and write on the database(.dat files)

      public static void write​(Object[] obj, String fileName)
      This method writes to the input data file
      Parameters:

      fileName - the file the object needs to be wrriten to

      Parameters:

      fileName - the file the menu item needs to be writen to.
